text: James Alton Coates (August 4, 1932 – November 15, 2019) was an American professional baseball pitcher. Coates pitched in Major League Baseball for the New York Yankees (1956, 1959–62), Washington Senators (1963), Cincinnati Reds (1963), and Los Angeles/California Angels (1965–67). He was born in Farnham, Virginia. Coates died on November 15, 2019 in Lancaster, Virginia at the age of 87.James Coates Obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:New York Yankees players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Texas Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Virginia
title: Jim Coates
